title: Bobby's ONE Wedding Task + 90’s Country Guitar Solo Game + A Listener Shares A Heartwarming Adoption Story
itunes:title: Bobby's ONE Wedding Task + 90’s Country Guitar Solo Game + A Listener Shares A Heartwarming Adoption Story
description:
Bobby tells us about the one wedding job he has to get done before the big day! He's in charge of the wedding music! He wants to hire both a DJ and a live band. A listener approached Amy with a really touching story about her adopted son. Plus, Bobby plays guitar solos from famous 90’s country songs and the crew has to try and name the songs!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
